summary:
The Rapture is a belief held by some American evangelical Christians. It describes a future event where all Christian believers, both living and dead, will rise up to meet Jesus in the sky. This idea comes from a Bible verse in 1 Thessalonians, using the Greek word *harpazo*, meaning "to snatch away."

Some Christians think this will happen before a time of trouble, called the Tribulation. However, many Christian churches don't believe in this doctrine and have different interpretations of the Bible's end-time events.
title: Rapture
